background_description: The background consists of deep blue open water, with some slight variations in light and shadow suggesting water movement or depth. There are no visible seabed features, coral reefs, rocks, or distinct algae formations.
explanation: The image clearly displays multiple Sergeant Major fish, easily distinguishable by their distinct black and white vertical stripes. These bold patterns stand out prominently against the uniform deep blue water background, indicating no attempt at camouflage.
